DELAY IN DESPATCH OF THE COMPOSITE DOCUMENT IN
RELATION TO THE MANDATORY CONDITIONAL

FOR AND ON BEHALF OF LUXVISIONS INNOVATION

AND TO CANCEL ALL THE OUTSTANDING OPTIONS OF

LIMITED AND/OR PARTIES ACTING IN CONCERT WITH IT)
